profile.name: Carl Lerche
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | AWS | Portland, OR
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for building scalable web applications. Proficient in Rust and experienced in database sharding.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer @aws
description: Designed and implemented high-performance web applications using tower-lambda and hello-axum.
Developed and maintained the pidfile-rust tool for efficient process management.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Contributed to various Rust-related projects, including rustls and turbowish-mocks.
Maintained the tokio-serde-json library for efficient JSON serialization.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Worked on miri, an interpreter for Rust's mid-level intermediate representation.
Contributed to the development of the wg-async-foundations library.

Database Sharding: Designed and implemented database sharding strategies for high-performance web applications.
